name: Hyperion Combatant: LITHOZEAL
description:
A Galaxy in trouble!  

Take the helm of HSS Perseverance to Fight the Lithozeal Menace.

You might find your destroyer Slow but if you use your short range jump, shield, and powerful deck gun properly; you might just survive the Hyperion Conflict.

 

Controls:  

Move – WASD

Aim – Mouse

Fire – Left Click

Jump Preview – Left Shift

Jump – space bar  

Developed By Graphite Lab Intern Class 2017

Dan Buechler -Game Designer

Cameron Samimi - Artist https://www.behance.net/cameronsamimi 

Chris House - Artist https://rikyo.artstation.com/ , @rikyo

 Mike Treis - Programmer

Made in Unity
